# GitHub Workflows

## Status

This repository does not use GitHub Actions workflows other than the dynamic Copilot workflow.

## Disabled Workflows

### Idea Miner Workflow

The "Idea miner" workflow has been disabled and should not be configured for this repository.

If you see notifications about an "Idea miner" workflow failing, please note that:
1. This workflow is not defined in this repository
2. It should not be running
3. Any external triggers or scheduled runs should be disabled via repository settings

## Adding New Workflows

Before adding any new workflow files, please ensure they are necessary and properly configured.

Workflow files should be placed in `.github/workflows/` directory.
